channel.description: Recent content in selectors on Delven Documentation

item.title: Element Selection
item.description: How to use Selector in Delven Selectors tell Delven which DOMElements we will be operating on. Selectors used for for DOM manipulation are similar to selectors used for data selector in SELECT clause. Selector types Name Spec Data Types Description by-css required [String] Select using CSS by-name required [String] Select using element name by-xpath required [String] Select using XPath by-regex required [String] Select using regular expressions Requirement [ { "by-XXXXX" : "SELECTOR", "filter" : "" } ] Examples For concreate example for specific types visit.
